ConfigureBackupPlan.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ConfigureBackupPlan
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BackupPlanId": "dbs-3enedogk",
    "BackupPlanName": "dbs-test",
    "UpperParallel": 6
}
ConfigureBackupPlan.title: 配置备份计划

CreateBackupPlan.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateBackupPlan
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DatabaseType": "mysql",
    "BackupMethod": "logical",
    "InstanceClass": "large",
    "Period": 3,
    "PayType": "prepay",
    "Count": 1,
    "AutoRenew": 1
}
CreateBackupPlan.title: 购买备份计划

CreateConnectTestJob.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateConnectTestJob
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Endpoint": {
        "DatabaseType": "mysql",
        "AccessType": "ccn",
        "UserName": "user1",
        "Password": "qwer1234",
        "Region": "ap-guangzhou",
        "Supplier": "others"
    }
}
CreateConnectTestJob.title: 创建连通性检测任务

DescribeBackupCheckJob.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeBackupCheckJob
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BackupPlanId": "dbs-qcloudtest"
}
DescribeBackupCheckJob.title: 查询备份计划预校验结果

DescribeBackupPlans.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dbs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeBackupPlans
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Status": [
        "running",
        "checkPass"
    ],
    "AccessType": [
        "extranet"
    ],
    "Limit": 20
}
DescribeBackupPlans.title: 查询备份计划列表

DescribeConnectTestResult.document: 查询连通性检测任务结果
DescribeConnectTestResult.title: 查询连通性检测任务结果
